skill.name: ecommerce
skill.summary: E-commerce site development guidance for product management, cart, checkout, orders, and inventory

security_audit.summary: Pure prompt-based skill containing only markdown documentation for e-commerce development. No executable code, no network calls, no file system access beyond reading the markdown file.

content.user_title: Build e-commerce sites with domain-driven design
content.value_statement: Developing e-commerce sites involves complex domain logic for products, cart, checkout, orders, and inventory. This skill provides structured guidance on domain design patterns, state transitions, API design, and security best practices for building robust online stores.
actual_capabilities: Design domain models for products, cart, orders, payments, and inventory
Create state transition diagrams for order and inventory workflows
Generate API endpoint designs following REST conventions
Implement inventory reservation patterns with optimistic locking
Apply security best practices including PCI DSS compliance and CSRF/XSS protection
Integrate with platforms like Shopify, STORE, and payment services like Stripe
limitations: Does not generate complete application code - provides design guidance only
Does not connect to live e-commerce APIs or databases
Does not process real payments or handle actual customer data
Requires following guidelines and adapting patterns to your specific tech stack

use_cases.title: Design e-commerce domain models
use_cases.description: Create entity relationships, state transitions, and bounded contexts for product catalog, cart, orders, and inventory systems

use_cases.title: Implement checkout and payment flows
use_cases.description: Build cart operations, apply coupons, calculate shipping, integrate payment gateways, and handle order state management

use_cases.title: Review existing e-commerce implementations
use_cases.description: Evaluate current systems against requirements checklists covering product management, security, performance, and compliance

prompt_templates.title: Domain model design
prompt_templates.prompt: Help me design the domain model for my e-commerce site. I need entities for products with variants (SKUs, prices, inventory), shopping cart, orders with status transitions, customers, and payments. Show entity relationships and state machine diagrams.

prompt_templates.title: Checkout flow implementation
prompt_templates.prompt: Design a checkout flow for my e-commerce site. Include cart finalization, inventory reservation, payment integration with Stripe, order confirmation, and timeout handling for abandoned carts. Show API endpoints and error handling.

prompt_templates.title: Inventory management
prompt_templates.prompt: Help me implement inventory management for my e-commerce platform. Include real-time stock tracking, low-stock alerts, reservation with optimistic locking, and integration with multiple warehouses. Show database schema and concurrency patterns.

prompt_templates.title: Security compliance
prompt_templates.prompt: Review the security requirements for my e-commerce site. I need to ensure HTTPS enforcement, PCI DSS compliance (card data non-storage), CSRF/XSS protection, authentication with 2FA support, and audit logging. Provide implementation checklist.

best_practices: Use optimistic locking for inventory reservation to prevent overselling during high traffic
Implement idempotent payment callbacks to handle duplicate webhook notifications
Separate read and write models (CQRS) for product catalogs to optimize performance
anti_patterns: Storing credit card numbers directly - always use tokenization with payment providers
Holding inventory in carts indefinitely - implement timeout-based release (15-30 minutes)
Single monolithic checkout flow - break into discrete steps with savepoints for recovery

faq.question: Which payment gateways does this skill support?
faq.answer: Supports Stripe, GMO PAY, PAY.JP for custom builds, plus platform-specific options like Shopify Payments and STORE's integrated payments.

faq.question: What is the maximum product catalog size?
faq.answer: The skill provides design patterns but performance depends on your database. Use pagination, caching, and search engines like Algolia for large catalogs.

faq.question: How do I integrate with Shopify?
faq.answer: Use Shopify's Storefront API for headless storefronts and Admin GraphQL for backend operations. The skill references Hydrogen for React-based headless commerce.

faq.question: Is customer data safe with these patterns?
faq.answer: Yes. Patterns emphasize PCI DSS compliance, encrypted storage, audit logging, and avoiding direct card data storage. Always follow privacy regulations.

faq.question: How to handle checkout failures?
faq.answer: Implement graceful rollback: release inventory on payment failure, save cart state, provide clear error messages, and support cart recovery via email.

faq.question: How does this compare to Shopify apps?
faq.answer: This skill guides custom e-commerce development. For Shopify-specific extensions, use Shopify's app framework. The patterns apply to any e-commerce platform.
